snippet.title: KINGDOM HEARTS HD 1.5 + 2.5 Remix - Fight the Darkness Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
The Heartless threaten to engulf all the worlds in darkness. Start wielding your Keyblade to protect each world and stop the Heartless! 

KINGDOM HEARTS HD 1.5+2.5 ReMIX takes you on a magical journey with Sora, Donald and Goofy as they travel to dozens of Disney worlds to fight the Heartless invasion. 

Restore the peace!  Remember and relive six epic KINGDOM HEARTS adventures. The HD Collection includes: 
• KINGDOM HEARTS FINAL MIX
• KINGDOM HEARTS Re:Chain of Memories
• KINGDOM HEARTS 358/2 Days (HD Remastered Cinematics)
• KINGDOM HEARTS II FINAL MIX
• KINGDOM HEARTS Birth by Sleep Final MIX
• KINGDOM HEARTS Re:coded (HD Remastered Cinematics)

https://www.kingdomhearts.com
